website_summaries.verdict: A good all-around club that lets you fine-tune the loft settings, so long as you have your own allen wrench.
pros: Features include a Forged 455 stainless steel face for distance and Baffler rails for better turf interaction
Also has adjustable loft settings to manage trajectory and distance
cons: While the loft settings are adjustable, you'll have to provide your own wrench to take advantage of this

customer_reviews.title: Solid Club
customer_reviews.text: I really like Cobra clubs. They fit my style of play and swing very well. This hybrid has been amazing. I have it dialed in at 22 degrees and got rid of my old 3 and 4 hybrids. Every swing feels like solid contact.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Armistead

customer_reviews.title: Love this club!
customer_reviews.text: Had never hit a hybrid before, so wasn't sure how I would do with it. I usually hit 3 or 4 iron on long approach shots, sometimes even 2 iron. I have Cobra F8 Driver, 3 wood and irons, but liked the idea of adjustability that the F8 hybrids don't offer. Bought this club in 3/4 and after taking it out a few times, all I can say is I am in love. Never hit long irons as consistently as I can hit this club. Even picked up a 5 hybrid to go in the bag. Would have liked to get a 2-3 also, but just can't find. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: A club for everyone
customer_reviews.text: This is an "everyone's" club. Great on a tee, great on the fairway, and great in the rough. I think all but the most skilled players should be using hybrids like this one!
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Shillito

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect product info.
customer_reviews.text: There was no tool for adjustment in the box. It should come with it. I was not able to talk or contact anyone to solve this but return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Hit!!
customer_reviews.text: Top City! Very hard to Hit... Don't believe the reviews! Bought this to try and get more distance on my second shot...Nope! Hits grounders! Really hard to get the ball up in the air.
customer_reviews.author: Tom P.

customer_reviews.title: The club is great.
customer_reviews.text: The club itself is fabulous! I got it as a Christmas gift for my son. I was surprised the adjustment tool didn't come with it. Luckily, I already have a Cobra driver that came with the adjustment tool, so I gave that tool to my son since I've already adjusted my clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight N Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Hits very well for a lousy golfer like me
customer_reviews.author: Louis F.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT. Clean and pure hits (and even a ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh man - I used this club for the first time yesterday without taking it to the range first. LOVE IT. Clean and pure hits (and even a mishit was struck still got loft and distance), nice easy swing weight, really a great club and goes oh so well with the F7 driver!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy one and you won't regret it
customer_reviews.text: One of, if not my favorite club in my bag. Absolutely great feeling hybrid, even better than my existing Cobra Amp Cell Hybrid which I was already a big fan of. Cannot recommend these enough, great feel and consistency from a 16 handicap player who only plays a few rounds a year.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Goodland

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite cobra hybrid.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible feel and launch. The club was not as user friendly as other cobra hybrids that I’ve owned.
customer_reviews.author: richard easton

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid
customer_reviews.text: Jury is still out but overall seems like a nice club. Replace for an aging 3 hybrid. Have hit some good solid shots with it. Feels good. Very satisfied thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Brett A Content

customer_reviews.title: Thinking of buy another club with different loft.
customer_reviews.text: This club is easy to hit from the fairway or the rough. I get good distance and accuracy. I am sorry I did not buy this club sooner.
customer_reviews.author: frank r hapcic

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Still in the bag. Adjustable lofts make it convenient for weekend golf w friends. The hit long and high. I tried the new F8 version and stuck w this.
customer_reviews.author: Kiawe Wood

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Club
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 4/5 Hybrid club and they shipped the 3/4 one. And no adjustment tool, either.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyB

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice if they included the tool to change the loft
customer_reviews.text: Club is exactly what I was looking for. Would be nice if they included the tool to change the loft.
customer_reviews.author: L. Blackshear

customer_reviews.title: First Hybrid
customer_reviews.text: This was my first hybrid club and really like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: David Eppert

customer_reviews.title: This model is adjustable but it’s replacement is not.
customer_reviews.text: Love the adjustability . Used it with my rangefinder to dial in the distance to slot in between my other hybrids.
customer_reviews.author: Gary VanVoorhis

customer_reviews.title: Terrific hybrid
customer_reviews.text: Terrific club out of the rough. Must not oversewing it, though. High trajectory and soft landing, Nice, I like it,
customer_reviews.author: svcace

customer_reviews.title: The best hybrid I have ever played
customer_reviews.text: The best hybrid I have ever played. The rails help keep the head square at contact, even in the rough!
customer_reviews.author: David Gempler

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Nice club, use it a lot. Like the adjustments for loft. Was delivered on time and in good shape.. Very happy with this purchasse.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: The price
customer_reviews.text: I used this for alternative to iron 5. It's very good.
customer_reviews.author: Khin Zaw

customer_reviews.title: Right Price
customer_reviews.text: The feel ez to hit I added both 3-4 and 4-5
customer_reviews.author: Bob Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Winner!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to hit out of the rough, I am delighted with performance.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable??
customer_reviews.text: Nice club... but incredible that the adjustment tool doesn’t come with it... and the features section says its adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Green

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Great for get to g the ball out if rough or hitting off hard pan,
customer_reviews.author: William G. Gillam

customer_reviews.title: Great club
customer_reviews.text: Great feel and weight. Solid, crisp sound when striking the ball.
customer_reviews.author: jogomeister

customer_reviews.title: Great trouble club
customer_reviews.text: Use this in rough all the time, great distance, true flight
customer_reviews.author: Ron Beals

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hybrid club, reasonably priced and amazon delivery commitment and packaging was excellent as week.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna Davila

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Never had a hybrid before, won't ever play again without it.
customer_reviews.author: Jairo E Sojo

customer_reviews.title: Great clubs.
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little bit to get used to. I use a strong grip and these clubs with that grip hooked the ball. After many tries I moved the ball 1-1.5 inches from centre. Also, I weakened my grip to neutral. Now, I don't use my 5 wood or my 3 and 4 irons. Great clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: The club was made good and I want it to work for me but ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to use it and it did not work for me.So I send it back. The club was made good and I want it to work for me but it did not. Larry
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Not as Described
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the wrench for the club that was in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Long

customer_reviews.title: Great Stick!
customer_reviews.text: First swing with this club and I was in love. Very forgiving and straight. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: 2017 Cobra Golf Men's King F7 Hybrid (Adjustable Lofts)
product_meta.description: New Baffler Rail design provides improved turf interaction and consistency from every lie. A single fixed weight positioned low and back results in a high towering ball flight for extreme distance and forgiveness. Lighter, thinner steel face maximizes face flexing for faster ball speeds and distance on off center hits. Eight easily adjustable loft settings manage trajectory and fine tune launch conditions to maximize distance while keeping the club head square at address regardless of the loft setting.
feature_bullets: Baffler Dual Rail System-New Baffler Rail Design provides improved turf interaction and consistency from every lie
Back CG Position with Fixed Weight-A single fixed weight positioned low and back results in a high towering ball flight for extreme distance and forgiveness
Forged 455 Stainless Steel Face-Lighter, thinner steel face maximizes face flexing for faster ball speeds and distance on off center hits
MYFLY8 with SMARTPAD-8 easily adjustable loft settings to manage trajectory

specifications.Item model number: HY KGF7 BK GPH REG 34 LH
